channel.title: Need Help with giveitem command

item.title: Need Help with giveitem command
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“holidayscape, post:4, topic:310302”][quote author=Jordiescape link=topic=406738.msg3005236#msg3005236 date=1256341837]

if (command.startsWith("giveitem") && playerRights > 1) { try { String[] cmd = command.split(" "); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(cmd[1]); if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) PlayerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; sM("You give "+p.playerName+" item "+cmd[2]); p.sM(playerName+" has given you an item."); p.addItem(Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[3])); } else {} } catch (Exception e) {} }
Usage: ::giveitem playername itemid amount.
[/quote]

thanks alot, repped.[/quote]

you cant rep at 10.

Read full topic

Usage: ::giveitem playername itemid amount.[/quote]

thanks alot.

item.title: Need Help with giveitem command
item.dc:creator: @holidayscape holidayscape
item.description:
@holidayscape wrote:

I tried adding my giveitem command and… well i failed lol. I need some help.

if (command.startsWith("giveitem")) { String text = command.substring(8); addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount (server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName)); }

My first attempt on creating my own command from scratch. Please dont eat me flamers

Read full topic
